instruction: Create an event called 'Meeting with Team' with location at 'Office' on 2024-01-05 10am to 11am to 'Discuss project status' in Google Calendar.

Update the 'Board Meeting' event on 2024-02-15 from 3pm to 4pm to add a note: 'Please prepare the Q1 reports' in Google Calendar.

Cancel the 'Client Presentation' event scheduled on 2024-04-22 from 2pm to 3pm in Google Calendar.

List the summary of all events on 2024-07-04 in Google Calendar. Sort by start time and save summeries to tmp/answer.txt, each summary separated by a new line.
Create a team meeting event in Google Calendar called 'Weekly Sync' at 2pm for 3 hour starting from 2024-04-02, with an email reminder 1 hour before.
For the 'End of Year Party' event on 2024-12-20 in Google Calendar, add a custom color (colorId: 11).
In Google Calendar, reschedule the 'Team Sync' event originally on 2024-05-10 12:00 AM to 2024-05-12 at 2:00 PM. You should also change the event description to match this change.

Check if there are any conflicting events with the 'Quarterly Planning Session' scheduled on 2024-09-20 from 1pm to 3pm in Google Calendar, and save the summary of conflicting events to tmp/conflicts.txt.

Check if there are any conflicting events with the 'Quarterly Planning Session' scheduled on 2024-09-20 from 1pm to 2pm in Google Calendar, and save the summary of conflicting events to tmp/conflicts.txt.
Find all 'Client Meeting' events in Google Calendar between 2024-08-01 and 2024-08-31. Save the dates and start times of these events to tmp/client_meetings.txt, each entry on a new line.

Check if there are any overlapping events with the 'Product Launch' event scheduled on 2024-08-25 from 1pm to 3pm in Google Calendar. Save 'Yes' to tmp/overlapping.txt if there are, otherwise save 'No'.

Check if there are any overlapping events with the 'Product Launch' event scheduled on 2024-08-25 from 1pm to 3pm in Google Calendar. Save hours of overlap to tmp/overlapping.txt if there are, otherwise save 'No'. You should keep the first two digits of the hours of overlap.
